channel.title: General - Functions on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in General - Functions on The CAD Coder

item.title: VBA In Solidworks
item.description:
Solidworks provides us two methods for open Visual Basic for Application.

  1. Menu based method
  2. Toolbar method

Please see below video for visual details.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Open new Part document
item.description:
As the title suggested, in this post, we open new document from Solidworks VBA macros.

Also we understand each and every line of written code. So that you can understand why we written those lines and get some knowledge about how to write macro properly.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Open Assembly and Drawing document
item.description:
In this post, we see how to open following documents with Solidworks VBA macro:

  1. Solidworks Assembly document

  2. Solidworks Drawing document

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Selection Methods
item.description:
In this post, we select Default planes with following methods.

  1. By SelectByID method From ModelDoc2 Interface.

  2. By SelectByID2 method From IModelDocExtension Interface.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Open Saved Documents
item.description:
In this post, I tell you how to open a saved document in Solidworks using VBA Macro.

We open document with 2 different methods.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Fix Unit Issue
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to Fix Unit Issue in Solidworks API from VBA Macros in a Sketch.
